overview: The behind the scenes film will show Jornet out of his usual environment and follow the athleteâ€™s world tour last year. It will also look at an unusual year in the life of Kilian Jornet, who suffered two injuries and managed to complete some sports projects he had had in mind for a long time, in addition to receiving great news: his future fatherhood.
tagline: A World Tour in my best worst year
title: Inside Kilian Jornet
